name: Neon Sunset
description:
You find yourself in an unknown place with no recollection of how you got there. With no memory of what happened yesterday, all you know is you need to get out of this place no matter the cost.

Neon Sunset is an third person shooter with influence from Synthwave and movies from the 80’s. Start with nothing and fight your way out with various weapons you will find throughout the level.

This game is a Ludum Dare 45 Entry.

Controls
  • WASD for movement
  • Left-click to fire
  • Q to drop weapon
  • E to open doors
Team
@LudBaO Programming
Graphics @realTobb Music
